familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trumpâ€™s assets from IT Operations LLC (Management Company in New York, NY; F/K/A IT Swimwear LLC) are reflected in the Ivanka M. Trump Business Trust. For the period January 1, 2016 - March 8, 2017, Ivanka Trump earned Over $5,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income and $142,453 in Non-royalty business income from the entity. She also served as President, Treasurer, Secretary of the company from Jul 1, 2012, until Jan 1, 2017. Under a prior reimbursement agreement, Ivanka Trump reimbursed IT Operations LLC for personal services received, including accounting and administrative services. That reimbursement agreement was terminated in October 2017 because she is no longer receiving those services.
familyMemberEthics.business: IT Operations LLC (Management Company In New York, NY; F/K/A IT Swimwear LLC)

familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump served as Director, President, Chairman, Secretary & Treasurer of IT OPERATIONS MANAGING MEMBER CORP (F/K/A IT Swimwear Managing Member Corp) from Jul 1, 2012, until Jan 1, 2017. The entity is a pass-thru company for IT Operations LLC. On her 2017 financial disclosure, it is listed as an employment-related asset valued at (no value reported). In the year before taking her unpaid position as assistant to her father in his presidency, she earned (no income reported) in (no income type reported) income from the pass-thru company. However, she earned more than $5 million from IT Operations LLC. Because there is no indication her interest in either entity has been divested or placed into a blind trust, both are marked in this database as an active potential conflict of interest.
